short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download your Endomondo workouts as TCX/GPX files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow any Endomondo logged in user to download his complete workout history to local computer. Each workout will be downloaded both as TCX and GPX formats.

** Hello Endomondo User **
 In order to download your workout history please log in to Endomondo.
Then hit the extension icon. and when the Download All Workouts button is available,
click on it.

It will download all your workouts to a folder named "endomondo-export-workouts",
placed in your default download folder. 
Within that folder you can find two subfolders:
1) tcx - all your workouts exported as tcx format
2) gpx - all your workouts exported as gpx format

*************************
Download Instructions:
*************************

Once you click the download button:

1) Stay at the same endomondo tab you are at (Home, Training, etc')
2) DO NOT refresh the page
3) DO NOT navigate to a different endomondo tab (Home, Training, etc')
* Refresh or Navigation to a different tab might STOP the download process.

*****************
Release Notes:
*****************

_____ v1.0.3 _____

Fetch workouts information page by page
Get a workouts page (20 workouts information),
download them, and continue to the next workouts page.
A much more efficient way.

_____ v1.0.2 _____

1) Save additional workout information:
1.1) Workout Description - the user description about the workout
1.2) Workout Pictures - the direct URLs to the pictures the user added to the workout
2) The file name of a workout with a workout title will be the workout title.
   In case you import this workout to other apps, the workout title will be restored.
   For example workout with a workout title "10km London Race" will be saved as:
   "10km London Race.tcx" and as "10km London Race.gpx"
3) Error Handling - handle fetch error, and reset the download process.
